values.description: Added by maintainers. Any arch team that stabilizes a package for their own arch can stabilize other arches at the same time without further testing.
values.name: ALLARCHES

values.description: This is a real bug that should get attention soon.
values.name: Bug

values.description: Have NATTkA CC arches once sanity-check succeeds
values.name: CC-ARCHES

values.description: Marks an issue to be a user submitted ebuild.
values.name: EBUILD

values.description: Defines a 'Goal' within the product. A top level feature that can be used for tracking duplicate/similar reports and requests. (metabugs are similar)
values.name: Goal

values.description:
Contains content that should be reviewed for integration.
Patches, apps/scripts, etc...
values.name: Inclusion

values.description: A case where someone is working on this maintained-needed ebuild in an overlay to test their fixes before including it in an ebuild in the tree.
values.name: InOverlay

values.description: Fix has been added to a VCS(either CVS, SVN, Git, ...) repository. Will be closed when fixes are applied to a stable level package.
values.name: InVCS

values.description: Request for a package to be keyworded for ~arch
values.name: KEYWORDREQ

values.description: The bug will be dealt with at a later date.
values.name: LATER

values.description: Someone has to provide a patch for the bug to receive further attention.
values.name: NeedPatch

values.description: This bug contains a patch
values.name: PATCH

values.description: Package is currently package masked.
values.name: PMASKED

values.description: The bug has a pull request filed (should be linked via 'See also'!).
values.name: PullRequest

values.description:
The ebuild has a *DEPEND on a package that is not needed or has
improper syntax.
values.name: QAbaddep

values.description:
The ebuild uses die in a way that causes the ebuild to needlessly
fail for a user.
values.name: QAbaddie

values.description:
IUSE contains a bad USE flag, is missing a flag, or a flag appears
to do nothing.
values.name: QAbadiuse

values.description:
A trivial problem and QA will fix it if there is no response in a
few days.
values.name: QAcanfix

values.description:
Two ebuilds reference the same file but have conflicting
digests for the file.
values.name: QAdigestoverlap

values.description:
Code is present in the global scope of the ebuild that should
not be.
values.name: QAglobalscope

values.description: New bug.. Wasn't there before and doesn't pertain to a new feature.
values.name: REGRESSION

values.description: A Gentoo developer has reviewed the ebuild or patch for syntax and coding style.
values.name: REVIEWED

values.description: Add this on all security related issues.
values.name: SECURITY

values.description: Summer of Code Ideas
values.name: SOCIDEAS

values.description: Spam bug filed by a bot
values.name: spam

values.description: Ebuilds that have been marked as stable by arch testers
values.name: STABLE

values.description: Request for a package to be stablized
values.name: STABLEREQ

values.description: Ebuilds that have been marked as tested by arch testers
values.name: TESTED

values.description: A package/ebuild failed test(s)
values.name: TESTFAILURE

values.description: Easily identify bugs for overview included in larger projects.
values.name: Tracker

values.description: The bug/patch has been sent to the upstream developer
values.name: UPSTREAM
